Description: This table stores AWS account related details including access key and secret key. ALKS admin enters accessKey and secretKey.

Data reference: Long term keys last rotated by
Long term keys last rotated date

Description: This table stores unique ids that reference to role/account/policy record. ALKS admin?s creates new records by selecting list of roles for a particular selected AWS account and manually entering the policy string.

This table has records that map role id?s to AD Groups. ALKS admin?s create new records by selecting an id from a select list of roles (roles are retrived by id?s filtered based on the account selected on UI) and selecting an AD group (all AD groups are pulled using service account and displayed on the UI)

Data reference: AD AWS groups retrived from AD using service account
